评论详情: I bought this thinking it would be super cute comfortable breathable to wear to a Disney park in the summer. When I got it, put it on the material was not flattering and not very comfortable. It was going to be 100° and I don’t think I was gonna be able to wear this for a 13 hour day.
The color is vibrant and it is so comfy and cute!!

I purchased this as a tennis dress.  It is very cute and fit well.  It is not breathable.  Living in Louisiana, it is too hot to play in this in the summer.  I will try it again in the spring, when the weather is milder.

It’s super cute and I wore it as a Tinkerbelle bound to Disney. Size M fit well but I will say it wrinkles easy which is weird for athletic wear even straight out of the dryer. I even steamed it and it didn’t want to come out flat but it wears nice and cool. Lots of compliments and people asking where I got it. Very comfortable.

This skort outfit fit nicely. The color was as pictured. I got the green. I ended up returning it because I found another outfit that suited my needs better. I was going to use this as a backup costume for Halloween.
The dress is true to size and super comfy. Material is breathable and comes with shorts. Will purchase again in other colors .

I got this as a birthday present in the mail. I was excited and immediately went to put it on. My husband pointed out a stain, which I said looked like blood. As I took off the shorts sure  enough, there was a dried blood stain on the inside of the shorts. Disastrous. I had to put gloves on to get it back into the plastic bag to send back and I could’ve been infected by somebody else’s blood.
It’s cute other than the weird sewn in band randomly in the middle. Makes it look like you have extra rolls that aren’t there 😅

This was such a comfortable dress. The quality seemed good but it showed to many of my mid section flaws so I returned it. Material was soft and loved the pockets. I also liked the detail on the back. Just wasn’t a great fit on me.
This is so soft! And the color is so bright. Absolutely love it!
I love that the shorts aren’t attached. It’s a very versatile, comfortable, and great fit! Def would buy again.
I'm 5'9 and this looks cute on.  Short but not too short.  I wear a DD cup size and the large fit great.  It does have light support but not heavy.

I loved the style of this dress and the scallops added such a feminine touch . The fit was perfect. The only complaint I have is the fabric was a little thinner than my other tennis dresses. So make sure your undergarments are a neutral color .
5’4 150 ordered a medium. - a little big in chest perfect length and shorts size tho.  Added sports bra pads to chest and it fits perfectly.
Love this dress. I have it in 3 colors. Comes with matching biker shorts. Flatteting and I often get compliments on it. Fabulous.

评论概述: ATTRACO Women Tennis Dress with Shorts
评论详情: beautiful tennis dress. Looking forward to wearing it out on the pickle ball court soon

评论概述: I have bought several colors in this because I love it so much!
评论详情: This is the best workout dress, it comes shorts that are not apart of the dress so when you go the bathroom you do not have to take everything off! Great material with scalloped edges that add the cutest detail. I have in black, blue, green, and pink and will probably buy more colors. I have tried some cheaper version of this dress but it does not compared to this one. It is definitely worth it!
This is a cute dress for tennis. The top Is a little low and shows the top of the bra. Otherwise it is great.
Tons of compliments and fits great. Scallop hem and neckline is very flattering. Ordered in 2 colors.
So comfortable and cute. Love the scallop edging and that it’s a 2 piece so I can go to the bathroom easily! Also has pockets in the shorts. What’s not to love!
Love the look and fit of dress.  The shorts are way too short.  They don’t do the job as needed.

My daughter loved the first one we bought so much that we immediately bought a second one.  Very flattering.  Love that the shorts are not attached so much more practical.  Worried that the white would be a bit see through but that was not the case.  Definitely exceeded expectations.
I received so many compliments! So cute with the scallops. Nice length, chest support was okay. Get it!

Fits great.  I wish the bra pads weren't so stiff.  They kinda give you a poke out look.  Softer, smoother pads would be better.  I like that the shorts are separate.  Makes it much easier to go to the bathroom
Runs big. Size down.
Dress runs very short and wide in the chest.

Super cute dress. I bought an XL in white and it was a little bit too big (5’7”/160) so I returned it. It was a great summer fabric, not too heavy . I planned on wearing it to play tennis. Comes with matching white biker type shorts which are super convenient for holding tennis balls. One problem is it suggests hand washing 😒 However, it’s inexpensive enough that I ordered a black one in lrg and will try my luck with washing on delicate.
In the photos the design is SO cute, but the scalloped edging looks a little cheap. It's a pretty cute dress but wasn't as high quality as I wanted it to be.

My neighbor ordered this in hot pink. Looks great on her so I ordered. The chest pads show through, badly. I learned she had removed hers so I hadn't noticed them being visible. But I am large chested, she is not. I need the pads. The material is nice but not as comfy and light weight as I hoped. I'd have kept if the chest pads were not as visible. Love the scalloped look. I am 5'8, 160lbs, 34DDD- wear size 4 in jeans/dresses. I could have also used an XL instead of large. I have a small waist and this is very tight fitting/clingy.

This tennis dress is fabulous on the court and off! Many players have asked where I purchased it. The fabric did not fade with washing although the sewing thread did, slightly. I bought four colors and returned the blue because it was cut very differently in the bodice.

This tennis dress is so comfortable on the courts but also very attractive. It catches everyone 's eye! Many compliments & it's my color...pink! Well made, fits well & excellent value. It just makes you feel pretty with it's scalloped edges!
I bought this based on an Instagram influencer’s post. It is so cute. I loved the scallop and the color. Unfortunately, the fabric is very thin and it runs small. So I ended up returning it.
Really cute and flattering!
Wound up returning this! Did not like the fit or fabric!

Love the fit and flare style, super comfortable and super cute! I got my true size and the top ended up being a bit too big. I sewed the straps and inner lining to make tighter and it worked! Planning to get more colors because I love it!

Tried lots of tennis dresses, and most I returned due to my tummy being visible. Not in this one! Very flattering and the bright pink is gorgeous. I also like how the shorts are not attached to make it easier to use the bathroom.

The dress is extremely soft and comfortable. I love the feminine details. I did NOT like the padding. It showed perfect circles and looks bad. I took them out and wore a regular bra underneath. On the other hand, the shorts are awesome. Using the bathroom is super simple! The pockets in the shorts are great too. Last, I’ll mention the outfit is handwash only. No drying or ironing allowed. I went over it with a damp washcloth to try to get wrinkles out. Hoping when I handwash it and lay it flat, the wrinkles will come out!
It fits so well and was so comfortable all day at the Disney parks. I am between an XL and XXL and the XL fit perfectly! I will definitely buy again.

The scallop details are adorable. The material is thick & not see-through. Love the pocket in the shorts. Fits TTS- I’m size 2/4 34 DD wearing a medium in this photo & it’s a bit loose- decided to size down to a small.

Across bottom hem. Have reordered and hope that next one is right because it’s so cute :)  I’m a medium but was able to order a small and get the top support I needed, due to the A-line of this dress. Flared out enough to work with my size Medium mid-section!
I love this and the scalloped edge! Sadly the fit was not very flattering on me

Arrived worn, inside out, and smelled. I’m beyond disgusted. Now I have to was my bedding because I took it out of the bag and sat it there not expecting dirty, worn clothes. This was the worst I’ve ever seen. I’ve gotten things that have been used or returned before, this was a whole new experience. 🤢

The dress is very well-made and a thicker material. The fit is a little off in my opinion. It looks as though the torso is slightly longer on the model, when in reality, the skirt hits right below the bust line. It has a very baby doll style fit. It is also shorter than expected, but I am 5’8. I ordered the small and normally wear an extra small too small and it fit perfectly. I am still undecided as to whether or not I’m going to return this. I also don’t like that the shorts do not have a flat waistband. Overall, the quality is nice and thick. Just not sure it’s worth the price as I don’t love it.

评论概述: Love the dress so much that I ordered 3 different colors, but...
评论详情: I ordered 3 different colors all in the same size, but one was at least 2 inches longer than the other 2.  One was too big and the other fit perfect, but didn't  like the color.  Sent them all back and reordered the one that was too long hoping that it will be shorter.  Quality was good and I really liked the style!
Will be getting more colors!
This dress is so soft and comfortable and love that the pants are separate. Packed well in Ky carry on and wasn’t wrinkled at all, fabric is awesome. I washed in cold water and line dried.
Beautiful and comfy. Good fit. I like the material. Wore it as a Tinker Bell outfit for Disney and pocket on the shorts was perfect for phone.
This is super cute but big in all the wrong places.  I ended up returning it. The pink is a real neon pink and I wish they had smaller sizes.
Love this dress. Super flattering and comfortable. Highly recommend!
These dresses are cute! The seam is in a kind of weird spot but for the price they’re nice in the summer
Perfect
Would not recommend. See how item arrived in the picture provided.
But It is loose and it is way too long.

评论概述: The shorts were not attached or included
评论详情: It is super cute and great fit but it's missing a main part - the shorts!  No attached or unattached shorts.

The dress is great. Only downside is that if you do not have a bigger bust you may not fill out the top in your normal size. I debated sending it back for a smaller size but I’m afraid that if I go a size down the rest of the dress and shorts may fit too snug.

I'm 5'1"/112 lbs and bought the XS.  It generally fit (maybe slightly tight around the waist) but didn't care for it on me.  The seam around the waist makes it flare out a little too much and makes me look hippier than I am. Maybe in the next size up it would hang a little but but didn't love it enough to reorder.
Very cute, true to size, nice stretch. Not see through with the white. Spandex shorts come with the set
Shorts are very loose and ride up but loved the dress and how it fit
Bought my daughter one if every color now after her first one that was pink - she wears them almost every day- beauty & comfort in one - gets tons of compliments!!!
I wore this dress to play pickleball.  It's very comfortable. I received lots of compliments on the style and color

Just got this dress and wore it once . It seems tobe a great dress . It is comfortable and very fashionable . The color is vivid and bright . I got several compliments on it . I am petite and it fits perfect . Can’t wait to take it on vacation
I am a size small and this was more like an extra small.
Amazon recommend a large. HUGE!  I ordered 2.  One came with the promised pants and not with the other. Sending both back too big!!!! Please send  shipping label.
Runs really big. Size down
Great product, fit, and material
This dress is so comfortable and cool for Activewear! It comes with shorts to wear instead of being built in which makes going to the bathroom easy!
The logo shouldn’t be so visible.

Love this dress! I got it to wear during a couples golf tournament and it was perfect, great material for Texas heat, shorts had pockets, fit perfectly. I wore a white steppe sports bra underneath for extra support, but it does have a built in bra with removable pads. I’m 5’2”, 112 lbs and typically wear an XS in dresses. I think the color is rad but lighter than it looks on their picture.
This dress is great for running errands or working out.  Super flattering, scalloped edging gives it a nice finish. Detached shorts make this my fave for convenience!

评论概述: As Vibrant in person as in the picture
评论详情: This dress is everything!!!  It’s so comfy, cool, and dries immediately when it gets sweaty or wet.  I love the comfort the dress provides and how adorable it is on!  I saw a lady at Disney wearing it and spotted her a mile away, immediately went on Amazon and found it bc it was that adorable on her.  I bought it on the spot.  I am 115 pounds, 5’3 and got an XS.  It fits perfectly!
Really nice quality
Returned this dress. I thought the material was cheap and the fit was off for me. Too short waisted and big around the middle. I’m 5’8”.

评论概述: For girls with very short torso
评论详情: It was not flattering :(

This is another Amazon purchase that I always get a ton of compliments on and have to send the link to multiple people. I personally love that the shorts are not attached so it's easier to go to the bathroom.
Wore them for a golf outing!  Got lots of compliments!

I dunno if you have to be really skinny for this dress???- but it’s a no- definitely shows rolls I didn’t even think I had lol the quality seems good as far as material but no support what so ever. For the price point I just don’t see how this received so many great reviews. Back to the not knock off version.
Love this dress. It's a bit short but I still love and would recommend. I am 5'6 for reference.
This dress fits PERFECTLY and the shorties are very comfortable. Have gotten many compliments which have made several friends buy as well and I have repurchased in other colors!
not flattering with a weird seam that cuts my body in half
Flattering fit, easy to move around, functional ball pockets

评论概述: So many compliments on this dress
评论详情: Unique color. Very comfortable. Has pockets and detached shorts.  Flattering cut/fit. Got so many compliments on this dress.
Great workout dress! Loved the hot pink color and that it comes with shorts. Does run very small. I'm a size 8 and typically wear an M, but had to return the M and exchange for an L in this dress.
I purchased this for a full immersion baptism and it was perfect. The material is very comfortable and I was fully covered during the entire baptism.

I really really loved this dress! It fit so perfectly. I am a 34D and I did not feel the need for a bra, the length was really flattering, and I felt like it was very athletically supportive around the waist. The material is almost like a mix between a bathing suit and a sport workout wear. It’s not super thick, but it is quality and I was worried about the scalloped, edging being cheap or curling up and it didn’t at all it laid flat the whole time, and it went through the wash and still kept it shape! This is true to size and is good on busty girls.
I absolutely love this dress! I probably wear it golfing once a week. I get so many compliments and it’s very comfortable!
Nice to have the shorts unattached.

I ordered this dress for our upcoming beach trip & it's perfect! If you're tall, I'd size up. I'm 5'1 and 105lbs and I got the XS. The waist is slightly tight on me but I'm also 12w pregnant so that's to be expected. I will definitely be wearing this as often as I can before I outgrow it. Also, the shorts aren't attached which make going to the bathroom easy! The quality feels very nice! 10/10 would recommend!

I used this as a race to be tinkerbell, but man I will also be using this for golf. It's so soft and lightweight. Very comfortable and the shorts being a separate were fantastic. I scallop detail is adorable and I got a lot of complements on it. Can't wait to try this one the course now

评论概述: Nice fitting tennis dress with shorts&bra
评论详情: Nice fitting tennis dress with shorts&bra  This is so flattering on my body shape! The length is great and the shorts fit fine. I really love the scalloped details around the skirt hem and neck and I got so many compliments. This dress has a built-in bra which does great support. The material is so soft and breathable that you may stay cool on a hot day.

This set is incredibly comfortable. It’s kind of insane just how comfy it is, and then you add in the bright green?! It’s perfection. From working out to going out, this dress/short set pretty much has you covered. Spring and summer couldn’t get here fast enough.

This dress has made my workouts so much more enjoyable. It's a fashionable design. This stylish and comfortable design features a nice neckline cut, allowing plenty of freedom of movement without feeling uncomfortable. The neckline is my favorite part, so I chose this outfit. The fabric is incredibly soft and stretches to hug my figure in all the right places, while the shorts provide two spacious side pockets that can easily hold small items such as tissue or lip balm.  Overall, this dress is suitable for any situation, and I'm so glad to have this!

评论概述: Nice fitting and makes a great casual summer dress
评论详情: Fits very well and is usable for both casual sports and regular wear.  You stay relatively cool and it pairs nicely with casual shoes.

Very well made dress.  Love the under shorts.This dress feels like it is made for a slightly straighter torso than I have.  I have the larger bust and hips measurements with the small waist - traditional hourglass.I am very impressed with the quality of the fabric.  I ordered tennis whites.  With lower quality fabric, white can be see through.I gripped some hot sauce on this beauty the very first day I wore it.  I was able to spot clean the fabric.  Everything held up well

The large fit me well, I am a 36DD.  The built-in sports bra offered light support, I would not suggest jumping around in it.  The cup pads are removable. The fabric itself for the dress and the shorts are made of a swimsuit-like material.  The fabric is very stretchy. The pockets are large enough to put a standard size smartphone in.
It is very good material

评论概述: Little black dress for all occasions
评论详情: This is not just a gym attire. Basically, you can change accessories, and you can wear this this dress anywhere! You can wear it with leggings or you can wear it with shorts. You can wear some nice necklace and make-up and high heels and you can go for partying or you can wear a sweater/t-shirt on top. I really love how it looks. The details on the neck stay still. The height of the skirt is ideal (not too long not too short) bra stays in place with light walking, and if you run, it is a medium support bra and still holds everything together. The shorts has 2 pockets and holds an S22 (most of it) it is good if you keep it for a short period of time or if you are shopping or at a night club. But I will not work while running. The material of the short is slippery, very short and no grip around the leg so if you have wider hips, it will go up. You may consider applying anti-chafe cream to any areas that are prone to chafe or wear longer shorts or leggings .

I absolutely love this set.  It looks great on! It seems to smooth out all the bulgy areas without feeling restrictive. I love that it's two pieces and that it has a built in bra (padded).  Truly thrilled I ordered this!
Pretty, fits nice, quality material, love the scallops and the built in bra.  Shorts have pockets.  Dress has a fun flair.

评论概述: Size up from your normal size
评论详情: The scalloping is super cute, but the dress fits snug in the body and the white doesn't hide any flaws. The length is great though and the shorts fit fine. It sure looks cute on others who have posted review pics, but it's just not flattering on my body right now.

I love this workout dress😍😍 I really like the pattern on the dress. The material is great! The workout bra is decent. And I like that the shorts are not attached so it makes going to the bathroom easier.
